name: Reptilianne Echidna
desc:
2 monsters, including a Reptile monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change its ATK to 0. During your Main Phase: You can add Reptile monsters with different names from your Deck to your hand, up to the number of monsters your opponent controls with 0 ATK, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Reptile monsters. You can only use each effect of "Reptilianne Echidna" once per turn.
